{{include reference="EESCCode.ShareMacro"/}} {{velocity}} #* * EESC share a project * ----- * * This page propose to share or change existing rights of an existing project. * * Author: Fabio MANCINELLI * Jean SIMARD * Mohamed BOUSSAA *# ############################################## ## GLOBALS ############################################## ## HTTP REQUEST PARAMETERS #set($reqStep = $request.getParameter('step')) #if($request.getParameter('cancel')) #set($reqStep = 'cancel') #end #set($reqReferer = $request.getParameter('referer')) #if(!$reqReferer) #set($reqReferer = $request.getHeader('referer')) #end #set($reqProjectName = $request.getParameter('projectname')) #set($reqScope = $request.getParameter('scope')) #set($editScope = $request.getParameter('editscope')) #set($viewScope = $request.getParameter('viewscope')) ## The scope is now a combination of edit scope and view scope (ex: all, some-all, some-some ...) #set($reqScope = $editScope) #if($editScope && $editScope != "all") #set($reqScope = $editScope + "-" + $viewScope) #end #set($editUsers= $request.getParameterValues('editusers')) #set($editGroups = $request.getParameterValues('editgroups')) #set($viewUsers = $request.getParameterValues('viewusers')) #set($viewGroups = $request.getParameterValues('viewgroups')) ############################################## ## CONTROLLER ############################################## #controller() #macro(controller) #if($reqStep.equals('cancel')) #stepCancel($reqReferer) #elseif($reqStep.equals('form') && $reqProjectName) #stepForm($reqProjectName) #elseif($reqStep.equals('share') && $reqProjectName) ## #stepShare($reqProjectName, $reqScope, $reqUsers, $reqGroups) #setProjectRights($reqProjectName, $reqScope, $editUsers, $editGroups, $viewUsers, $viewGroups) #else #displayError() #end #end ############################################## ## ADD DATA ############################################## #* * Share the project * ----- * * Given the HTTP POST request, change the project rights. * * @param $projectName The name of the project to create * @param $scope The type of restriction of the project ('public', 'shared-public', 'shared-private' or 'private') * @param $users The list of authorized users if it apply (if $scope is 'shared-*') * @param $groups The list of authorized users if it apply (if $scope is 'shared-*') *# #macro(stepShare, $projectName, $scope, $users, $groups) #set($projectref = $services.model.createDocumentReference(${xcontext.mainWikiName}, 'Projects', $projectName)) #set($project = $xwiki.getDocument($projectref)) #set($shareobj = $project.getObject('EESCCode.CollaborativeProjectClass')) #set($discard = $shareobj.set('scope', $scope)) #set($discard = $project.removeObjects('XWiki.XWikiRights')) ## Rights of the creator #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $project.creator)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit,delete,creator')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #if($scope.endsWith('public')) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', 'XWiki.XWikiAllGroup')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #if($scope.startsWith('shared')) #if($scope.equals('shared-public')) #set($rights = 'view,edit') #elseif($scope.equals('shared-private')) #set($rights = 'view') #end ## Rights for the users #foreach($username in $users) #set($user = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($username))) #if($user.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiUsers') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $username)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end ## Rights for the groups #foreach($groupname in $groups) #set($group = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($groupname))) #if($group.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiGroups') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', $groupname)) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end #end #set($discard = $project.save()) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($projectref, 'view', ''))) #end #* * Share the project * ----- * * Given the HTTP POST request, change the project rights. * * @param $projectName The name of the project to create * @param $scope The type of restriction of the project ('all','some-all','some-some','nobody-all','nobody-some','nobody-nobody') * @param $editUsers The list of authorized users to edit if it apply (if $scope is 'some-*') * @param $editGroups The list of authorized users groups to edit if it apply (if $scope is 'some-*') * @param $viewUsers The list of authorized users to view if it apply (if $scope is 'some-some' or 'nobody-some') * @param $viewGroups The list of authorized users groups to view if it apply (if $scope is 'some-some' or 'nobody-some') *# #macro(setProjectRights, $projectName, $scope, $editUsers, $editGroups, $viewUsers, $viewGroups) #set($projectref = $services.model.createDocumentReference(${xcontext.mainWikiName}, 'Projects', $projectName)) #set($project = $xwiki.getDocument($projectref)) #set($shareobj = $project.getObject('EESCCode.CollaborativeProjectClass')) #set($discard = $shareobj.set('scope', $scope)) #set($discard = $project.removeObjects('XWiki.XWikiRights')) ## Rights of the creator #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $project.creator)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', 'view,edit,delete,creator')) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #if($scope.endsWith('all')) #set($rights = 'view') #if($scope.equals('all')) #set($rights = 'view,edit') #end #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', 'XWiki.XWikiAllGroup')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #if($scope.startsWith('some')) #set($rights = 'view,edit') ## Rights for the edit users #foreach($username in $editUsers) #set($user = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($username))) #if($user.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiUsers') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $username)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end ## Rights for the edit groups #foreach($groupname in $editGroups) #set($group = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($groupname))) #if($group.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiGroups') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', $groupname)) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end #end #if($scope.endsWith('some')) #set($rights = 'view') ## Rights for the view users #foreach($username in $viewUsers) #set($user = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($username))) #if($user.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiUsers') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', $username)) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end ## Rights for the view groups #foreach($groupname in $viewGroups) #set($group = $xwiki.getDocument($services.model.resolveDocument($groupname))) #if($group.getObjectNumbers('XWiki.XWikiGroups') >= 1) #set($object = $project.newObject('XWiki.XWikiRights')) #set($discard = $object.set('users', '')) #set($discard = $object.set('groups', $groupname)) #set($discard = $object.set('levels', $rights)) #set($discard = $object.set('allow', 'true')) #end #end #end #set($discard = $project.save()) #** * Updates project tasks rights *# #set($ProjectRightsManager = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("EESCCode.ProjectRightsManagerGroovy")) #set($discard = $ProjectRightsManager.init($xwiki, $context, $services)) #set($discard = $ProjectRightsManager.setProjectTasksRights($projectref)) ## Redirection #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($xwiki.getURL($projectref, 'view', ''))) #end ############################################## ## VIEW ############################################## #* * Redirect to the referer * ----- * * Redirect the user to the page from where it was coming from. * * @param $referer The URL to redirect *# #macro(stepCancel, $referer) #set($discard = $response.sendRedirect($referer)) #end #* * Display error * ----- * * Display an error when the HTTP request is incomplete. *# #macro(displayError) {{error}} ${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectShare.error')} {{/error}} #end #* * Display the form * ----- * * Display the form to the user * * @param $spaceName The optional space name that may have been given *# #macro(stepForm, $spaceName) #set($projectref = $services.model.createDocumentReference($services.wiki.currentWikiId, 'Projects', "${reqProjectName}")) #set($projectlink = "${reqProjectName}") #set($message = ${services.localization.render('eesc.ProjectShare.message', ["${projectlink}"])}) {{html clean='false'}}
